thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable stay, great value for the location
thread.title_full: Comfortable stay, great value for the location - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Louise M
title: Comfortable stay, great value for the location
text:
We booked in advance for a Friday night in March securing a comfortable twin room for Â£55, breakfast extra. The room was clean and modern, the beds were comfortable. The staff were helpful and were happy to provide extra tea and milk for the room. The shower cubicle was spacious and the shower was good. Breakfast was to a very good standard, the staff were friendly and efficient. This is a great location only five minutes walk from the Tower of London. Not many restaurants close by for dinner though.
Room Tip: Rooms at the rear of the hotel are away from the road. See more room tips
